artist: Artist: J. Angel Benito et al.; Editor: Eva Mesanza
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, faint comic panels behind text and a triangle-shaped emblem featuring the title, "EM / BE / RO..."; 60 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Embero
